actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to remove Members of Congress from the purview of section 225 of the Federal Salary Act of 1967, relating to the Commission on Executive, Legislative, and Judicial Salaries.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Salary Act of 1967 to exempt from review by the Commission on Executive, Legislative, and Judicial Salaries the rate of pay for Members of Congress.

titles.title: A bill to remove Members of Congress from the purview of section 225 of the Federal Salary Act of 1967, relating to the Commission on Executive, Legislative, and Judicial Salaries.
